name: Dick's Sporting Goods Pittsburgh Marathon
company_overview: The Dick’s Sporting Goods Pittsburgh Marathon is hosted by a nonprofit organization, Pittsburgh Three Rivers Marathon Inc., and all events are funded through the generosity of sponsors and runners.  Recognized as one of the nation’s fastest growing marathons, the race debuted in May of 2009 with a sold-out field of over  10,000 participants in the marathon, half marathon and marathon relay. In May of 2011, a sold-out field of approximately 20,000 participated in five race weekend events. The event’s 2011 Run for a Reason charity program raised over $1.3 million for participating charities, and several runners qualified for the 2012 U.S. Olympic Trials at the race. The May 6, 2012 events promise to be even bigger and better.
mission: The Dick’s Sporting Goods Pittsburgh Marathon is a non-profit organization which promotes the love of long-distance running and enhances community involvement in fitness activities through high quality events open to a wide variety of ages and ability levels. Our events will consistently serve the needs of our runners and our sponsors; will engage and reward our volunteers; will enhance the economic well-being of the Pittsburgh region; will partner with public and private entities to create the best possible event experience; and partner with appropriate charitable organizations to give back to the community.
general_info:
Events include:
Dick's Sporting Goods Pittsburgh Marathon - Sunday, May 6, 2012
UPMC Health Plan Pittsburgh Half Marathon - Sunday, May 6, 2012
FedEx Ground Pittsburgh Marathon Relay - Sunday, May 6, 2012

Toyota of Pittsburgh Kids Marathon - Saturday, May 5, 2012
UPMC Health Plan/UPMC Sports Medicine Pittsburgh 5K Run - Saturday, May 5, 2012

GNC Live Well Pittsburgh Health and Fitness Expo - Friday, May 4, 2012 - Saturday, May 5, 2012


Oxford Athletic Club Freaky 5K - Saturday, October 29, 2011
Wyndham Grand Pittsburgh Downtown Terrifying 10K  - Saturday, October 29, 2011

fields.name: id
fields.description: The Page's ID. No access token or user `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The Page's name. No access token or user `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: link
fields.description: Link to the page on Facebook. No access token or user `access_token`. `string` containing a valid URL.

fields.name: category
fields.description: The Page's category. No access token or user `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: likes
fields.description: The number of users who like the Page. No access token or user `access_token`. `number`.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The Page's street address, latitude, and longitude (when available). No access token or user `access_token`. `dictionary`.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number (not always normalized for country code) for the Page. No access token or user `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: checkins
fields.description: The total number of users who have checked in to the Page. No access token or user `access_token`. `number`.

fields.name: picture
fields.description: Link to the Page's profile picture. No access token or user `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: website
fields.description: Link to the external website for the page. No access token or user `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: talking_about_count
fields.description: The number of people that are talking about this page (last seven days). No access token or user `access_token`. `number`

fields.name: access_token
fields.description: A Page admin `access_token` for this page; The current user must be an administrator of this page; only returned if specifically requested via the `fields` URL parameter. `manage_pages`. `string`
